results.title: Simvastatin attenuates the c-Raf/Erk and calcineurin-NFATc2 pathways via inhibition of Hsp90 activity during the development of heart failure.
results.text_hl: These results suggest that @GENE_HSP90AA1 @GENE_299331 @@@Hsp90@@@ inhibition is partly responsible for the inhibitory effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the development of @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064752 @@@myocardial remodeling@@@.

citations.NLM: Marunouchi T, Fujita K, Takahashi K, Namiki S, Kyo L, Uchida M, Yano E, Tanonaka K. Simvastatin attenuates the c-Raf/Erk and calcineurin-NFATc2 pathways via inhibition of Hsp90 activity during the development of heart failure. J Pharmacol Sci. 2023 Jan;151(1):17-27. PMID: 36522119

results.title: Simvastatin reduces human atrial myofibroblast proliferation independently of cholesterol lowering via inhibition of RhoA.
results.text_hl: The purpose of this study was to investigate the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ atrial myofibroblast proliferation.

citations.NLM: Porter KE, Turner NA, O'Regan DJ, Balmforth AJ, Ball SG. Simvastatin reduces human atrial myofibroblast proliferation independently of cholesterol lowering via inhibition of RhoA. Cardiovasc Res. 2004 Mar 1;61(4):745-55. PMID: 14985071

results.title: Simvastatin prevents load-induced protein tyrosine nitration in overloaded hearts.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, antioxidant properties of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ might play a role in @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064752 @@@myocardial remodeling@@@ induced by @DISEASE_Iron_Overload @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@pressure overload@@@.

citations.NLM: Nadruz W Jr, Lagosta VJ, Moreno H Jr, Coelho OR, Franchini KG. Simvastatin prevents load-induced protein tyrosine nitration in overloaded hearts. Hypertension. 2004 May;43(5):1060-6. PMID: 15023931

results.title: Antiarrhythmic effects of simvastatin in canine pulmonary vein sleeve preparations.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Our data suggest that in addition to its upstream actions to reduce @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064752 @@@atrial structural remodeling@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ exerts a direct antiarrhythmic effect by suppressing triggers responsible for the genesis of @DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@.

citations.NLM: Sicouri S, Gianetti B, Zygmunt AC, Cordeiro JM, Antzelevitch C. Antiarrhythmic effects of simvastatin in canine pulmonary vein sleeve preparations. J Am Coll Cardiol. 2011 Feb 22;57(8):986-93. PMID: 21329846
citations.BibTeX: @article{21329846, title={Antiarrhythmic effects of simvastatin in canine pulmonary vein sleeve preparations.}, author={Sicouri S and Gianetti B and Zygmunt AC and Cordeiro JM and Antzelevitch C}, journal={J Am Coll Cardiol}, volume={57}, number={8}, pages={986-93}}

results.title: Effect of simvastatin and antioxidant vitamins on atrial fibrillation promotion by atrial-tachycardia remodeling in dogs.
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: We studied @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@ subjected to @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064752 @@@atrial tachypacing@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064752 @@@ATP@@@) at 400 bpm in the absence and presence of treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Ascorbic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001205 @@@vitamin C@@@, and combined vitamins C and E.

citations.NLM: Shiroshita-Takeshita A, Schram G, Lavoie J, Nattel S. Effect of simvastatin and antioxidant vitamins on atrial fibrillation promotion by atrial-tachycardia remodeling in dogs. Circulation. 2004 Oct 19;110(16):2313-9. PMID: 15477401
citations.BibTeX: @article{15477401, title={Effect of simvastatin and antioxidant vitamins on atrial fibrillation promotion by atrial-tachycardia remodeling in dogs.}, author={Shiroshita-Takeshita A and Schram G and Lavoie J and Nattel S}, journal={Circulation}, volume={110}, number={16}, pages={2313-9}}

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on the development of the atrial fibrillation substrate in dogs with congestive heart failure.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064752 @@@atrial structural remodeling@@@ and @DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@ promotion are attenuated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, but not @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@fenofibrate@@@.

citations.NLM: Shiroshita-Takeshita A, Brundel BJ, Burstein B, Leung TK, Mitamura H, Ogawa S, Nattel S. Effects of simvastatin on the development of the atrial fibrillation substrate in dogs with congestive heart failure. Cardiovasc Res. 2007 Apr 1;74(1):75-84. PMID: 17270161
